'It's almost time...'%K%P
I was talking to myself as I checked my watch.%K%P
Kagura had begged me to go on a date right away,\nso we were supposed to meet up after school.%K%P
It was almost time, but she still wasn't there.%K%P
'Ahh!'%K%P
'Ahh?!'%K%P
A pain suddenly ran through my body.%K%P
Through my hip, to be exact...\nI looked around in a panic.%K%P
'Hehe, did I keep you waiting?'%K%P
'Geez Kagura, don't surprise me like that...'%K%P
'I just figured it'd be more fun that way.'%K%P
'Nope, I would have to disagree.'%K%P
'Really? You sure?'%K%P
'Just, take it easy next time, okay?'%K%P
'Okay!'%K%P
She responded quite cheerily.%K%P
Was she really even listening?\nJudging by the look on her face I'd say no.%K%P
'Well anyway, Akiba is as packed as always, huh?\nPeople and goddesses everywhere.'%K%P
'I probably won't stand out all that much\nin a crowd like this, huh?'%K%P
She said it with a smile on her face.\nBut she couldn't have been more wrong.%K%P
Akiba may have been filled with goddesses,\nbut she still drew a lot of attention.%K%P
'No, I think you still stand out quite a bit.'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
'Yup. You're just too adorable.'%K%P
Shoot. There I go again.\nJust speaking without thinking.%K%P
'Hehehe, thanks.\nYou sure know how to make a girl smile!'%K%P
'Oh, I... No, it's just...\nLots of people out here today, huh? Ahaha!'%K%P
'Don't try to hide it!'%K%P
She latched on to my arm as she spoke.%K%P
And as she did, her busty bosom\npressed into my elbow.%K%P
'H-Hey, your chest is...'%K%P
'Special service!\nDon't you like it?' *Squish squish*%K%P
She looked like she was having fun\nrubbing her goods on me.%K%P
If I had to say whether I liked it or not,\nI'd have to say yes!%K%P
'Anyway, now that you've had your special service,\nshall we get going?'%K%P
'Hey, don't pull.'%K%P
'Come on come on, let's go!'%K%P
She vigorously tugged at my arm,\nexcited to get going.%K%P
And so it was that our first date got off\nto an exciting sort of start.%K%P
'Are you sure you just want to go to\nAkiba, though?'%K%P
'Huh, what do you mean?'%K%P
'For our date.\nYou sure you didn't want to go somewhere else?'%K%P
We could have gone to a theme park, the movies...%K%P
Akiba wasn't a bad place,\nbut it wasn't exactly a great date spot.%K%P
'Oh, no, don't worry about that.\nAkiba works out well.'%K%P
'Actually, it just HAD to be Akiba\nfor our date today.'%K%P
'Wait, what do you mean?'%K%P
'Ahahaha, don't worry about it.\nJust a personal thing.'%K%P
'Anyway, we're finally on a date.\nLet's enjoy it, 'kay?'%K%P
'Alright, fine.'%K%P
This date was her idea anyway.%K%P
This was all for her,\nso the details didn't really matter.%K%P
'Oh, hey! Look at that!\nThere's a maid giving out flyers!'%K%P
'You're right!\nBut... That's not really all that uncommon.'%K%P
In fact, here in Akiba at least,\nit was more common than anything.%K%P
I guess it would be something exciting\njust about anywhere else, though.%K%P
That fact that we have goddesses wandering around\nseemed infinitely more incredible.%K%P
'I wonder what maid cafe she works at?\nOr maybe she's actually a goddess?'%K%P
'Hmm, who knows?'%K%P
'Hey, Yamato,\nyou like places like that, don't you?'%K%P
'Hold on a sec, when did I ever say that?'%K%P
'But the first time we both met was at a\ngoddess cafe, wasn't it?'%K%P
'Oh yeah, I guess you're right.'%K%P
I had just finished up some errands that day,\nsaw Shuri performing on the street and\nfound myself taking interest...%K%P
Then I saw that there was a cafe\nputting on live shows, so I decided to check it out.%K%P
'That was all quite the shock.'%K%P
'Why? Was I just too charming\nfor you to handle?' %K%P
'No, it was just that all of a sudden you started\nstripping down on stage.'%K%P
'Ahaha, yeah, that's right!'%K%P
'I don't think it's something to just laugh about.'%K%P
'Let's just make sure that you don't start stripping\nduring the final audition, okay?'%K%P
'Yeah yeah, I know.\nYou sure like to worry.'%K%P
I was pretty sure she would be okay, but still,\nshe had a tendency to undress when excited.%K%P
'Don't worry, the only person who will get\nto see me naked now is you!'%K%P
'You do know that's not\nwhat I'm worried about here, right?'%K%P
'Wait, so you mean, you don't mind if\nother people see me naked, then?'%K%P
'No no no...'%K%P
'See? Don't try and cover it up.'%K%P
She latched on to my arm again as she spoke.%K%P
Looking at the smile she had on her face,\nI couldn't say any more.%K%P
'It really feels like that whole thing was\nso long ago, though.'%K%P
'Yeah. We've been through a lot, huh.'%K%P
Kagura and Shuri had teamed up just because of\nsome random idea I'd had.%K%P
We'd had our share of bumps along the way,\nbut hard work got us through the preliminaries.%K%P
And now here we were,\njust one day before the final audition.%K%P
'I wasn't sure what to do when you checked\nthe online rankings and said you'd drop out.'%K%P
'Oh, haha, sorry about that.'%K%P
'No, no, I'm not mad.\nBut it's a good thing you kept at it, right?'%K%P
'Yeah, seriously. You were right.'%K%P
I thought back on everything we had done so far.%K%P
We'd put a lot of effort into our online activities,\nand had ended up with tons more fans.%K%P
People weren't posting saying how she was just\ndimwitted eye-candy or anything anymore.%K%P
Now they just talked about how incredibly cool\nshe was and how sexy her dancing was.%K%P
Still though,\nwe wanted a bit more than just that.%K%P
'Not much time left until auditions are over.'%K%P
She muttered to herself,\nit seemed we were thinking the same thing.%K%P
'You nervous?'%K%P
'Hmm... I guess I'd be lying if I said I wasn't.\nBut I've just gotta do my best.'%K%P
She started to smile again.%K%P
I knew she had to be feeling the pressure\nat least a bit.%K%P
After spending all this time with her, I saw how\nhumans and goddesses were alike in those ways.%K%P
'I know it doesn't sound like much,\nbut I believe in you, Kagura.'%K%P
'Thanks, Yamato.'%K%P
I really wished I had something better\nto say to her.%K%P
I was really upset with myself for not\nfinding the right words.%K%P
I just wanted to say something, anything,\nthat would boost her morale...%K%P
'Um, excuse me!'%K%P
'Yes?'%K%P
'Sorry if I'm wrong, but,\nAre you... Kagura?'%K%P
Some girl came up to us out of the blue,\nlooking quite nervous.%K%P
But Kagura seemed to think nothing of it.%K%P
'Huh? Me? Yes, that's right.'%K%P
'Wow, really?!'%K%P
Why was this girl coming up to her like this?%K%P
Had she seen Kagura's stuff online\nor during the auditions or something?%K%P
'Um, well...'%K%P
She looked like she was struggling to speak.%K%P
Hold on, was this girl going to try to criticize\nKagura's performances?%K%P
'Well, you see!'%K%P
'Hey...'%K%P
'I'm a huuuge fan!!'%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
'Really? Oh, that's wonderful!'%K%P
'Can I shake your hand?'%K%P
'Of course! Here...'%K%P
'Wow! Thank you so much!'%K%P
Kagura offered out her hand and the girl\nshook it with vigor.%K%P
I guess I had just been imagining things.%K%P
'I'm going to be voting for you in the auditions,\nso good luck!'%K%P
'Aww, thanks. I really appreciate it!'%K%P
'Anyway, sorry for calling out to you\nall of a sudden.'%K%P
She seemed quite excited as she said this,\nnodded in apology again, and made her way off.%K%P
'Well look at you,\nso famous you're getting noticed on the streets.'%K%P
'Hehehe, it's no big deal.\nJust a coincidence.'%K%P
'Still, I'm kind of glad to know that I have\nsome girl fans, too.'%K%P
What had I been worried about...?\nShe seemed super pleased.%K%P
I should have expected no less from a goddess.\nBut, it was Kagura after all.%K%P
'Hey, wait, is that Kagura?\nOver there!'%K%P
'Kagura? Who's that?'%K%P
'Oh come on, she's one of the L☆SEVEN audition\nfinalists.'%K%P
'Oh, the sexy one?'%K%P
'Watch your mouth! Yeah, sure, she is pretty sexy,\nbut she's more than that, okay?!' %K%P
'She's a great dancer,\nand even a great singer lately!'%K%P
'Geez, alright already. No need to yell.'%K%P
A couple of boys nearby us seemed to be\nquite excited over something.%K%P
'Hey, you think those people over there\nare your fans, too?'%K%P
'If I had to guess, yeah.'%K%P
'What should we do? Should we say something?'%K%P
'If you like her that much, go for it.'%K%P
'But wouldn't it be bad to\nbother her on her time off?'%K%P
'Hey, don't ask me.'%K%P
'Hey, you guys.'%K%P
'WHAT?! Did she just talk to US?!'%K%P
'What the?! Wh-What should we do?'%K%P
'Hey, why are you getting all panicked, too?'%K%P
'B-Because I'm secretly a huge fan too!'%K%P
'Are you kidding me?!'%K%P
'Hey, you boys wouldn't happen to be fans of mine,\nwould you?'%K%P
'Oh, um, y-y-y-es!'%K%P
'I always watch your dance videos\nwhenever they're posted online.'%K%P
'Oh. Thanks.\nIt's okay to relax now, you know.'%K%P
That was certainly out of the question.%K%P
Any idol fan would be beside themselves if the\nidol they adored suddenly approached them.%K%P
But that was one of the great things about Kagura,\nshe always acted so normal despite it all.%K%P
'Could we uhh... Ask for your signature?'%K%P
'Of course. Do you have something I could sign with?'%K%P
'Oh, yeah, I have a marker.'%K%P
'Nice! Could you sign this shirt??'%K%P
'Mine too!'%K%P
'Okay okay, let's take turns now.'%K%P
Kagura took her time,\nand signed their t-shirts in order.%K%P
They seemed beyond pleased and continued thanking\nher again and again before taking off.%K%P
'Sorry for the wait.'%K%P
'No worries.\nStill though, you're getting pretty famous.'%K%P
'Nah, come on, that was just coincidence, too.'%K%P
She laughed it off, blushing,\nbut I knew I was right.%K%P
Akiba was a place packed with people and\ngoddesses alike.%K%P
It was just way too likely that someone would\nhappen to notice her out in this crowd.%K%P
And as if to prove as much...%K%P
'Oh my god, is that Kagura?'%K%P
'Wait, you mean the one who made it to the finals\nin the L☆SEVEN auditions?'%K%P
And just like that fan after fan kept picking her out\nfrom the crowd...%K%P
'Phew...'%K%P
'Well, that was something.'%K%P
I tried to change the subject after she had\nspent so much time handling fans.%K%P
By the time things finally settled down\nit was already getting dark.%K%P
'Ahahaha, I never expected that I would\nrun into THAT many fans.'%K%P
'It's just proof that your hard work up till now\nis paying off.'%K%P
'Sounds good when you put it that way.'%K%P
'But it wasn't just me.\nYou've helped me along the whole way.'%K%P
She spoke with a smile on her face.%K%P
I have to say, I was genuinely happy to hear\nher say something like that.%K%P
'No no no...\nThis is all you and your charm.'%K%P
'I'd say this should be enough of a boost\nto help you through the end of auditions, huh?'%K%P
'Yeah... Maybe.'\nI'm glad we came out here today.'%K%P
'Hey, Yamato...\nThere's still just one more place I wanted to go...\nDo you mind?'%K%P
'Not at all. Where are we headed?'%K%P
'Just follow me. You'll understand.'%K%P
And with that she started off.\nI just did as she said and followed along.%K%P
'Okay, here we are.'%K%P
'This is...'%K%P
'Yup.\nIt's the stage for the auditions tomorrow.'%K%P
Right before our eyes was the special stage set up\njust for the finals.%K%P
This was where the goddesses would make\ntheir final claim at stardom.%K%P
'So, you see, I had a reason in mind for coming out\nto Akiba today...'%K%P
'I wanted to go on a date with you, of course.\nBut I also wanted to double-check my feelings.'%K%P
'Your feelings about...?'%K%P
'Well... Just why I wanted to be an idol\nin the first place...'%K%P
'Tomorrow is the last day of auditions, so I just\nwanted to come out here and remind myself of why.'%K%P
She kept her eyes on the stage as she spoke.\nI just stayed quiet, listening.%K%P
'This place is where it all started.\nWhere my life as an idol began...'%K%P
'You know, the first time I came here I just couldn't\nget over how wonderful a place it was.'%K%P
'Why?'%K%P
'Because everyone here, people and goddesses alike\nall seemed to be having so much fun!'%K%P
'As soon as I saw all those smiling faces, I knew.'%K%P
'I knew I wanted to help people have even more fun.\nAnd to smile even more than ever!'%K%P
'So you decided to become an idol?'%K%P
'Yep! And just at that very moment,\nan L☆SEVEN ad played on the big monitor.'%K%P
'I looked around and saw everyone watching with\nstars in their eyes and smiles on their faces...'%K%P
'And I knew I wanted to be like the girls on screen!'%K%P
Her eyes were shining too, as she spoke.\nEven her voice grew excited.%K%P
'So I just wanted to come back out here to Akiba\nand kind of relive those memories.'%K%P
'So that's what this was all about, huh?'%K%P
'I'm sorry we didn't get to really do any sort of\ndate-y things.'%K%P
'Don't worry about it.\nI'm always here for you, no matter what.'%K%P
'As long as you're working hard for it,\nI'll support you every step of the way.'%K%P
'Thanks, Yamato...'%K%P
'I'm giving it all I've got tomorrow!'%K%P
'And I'll do it because I want to be the one putting\nsmiles on all their faces!'%K%P
'I'm sure you'll make it.'%K%P
I couldn't say anything more than that.%K%P
But it didn't matter, because meeting up with fans\ntoday was enough to make her shine.%K%P
All the hard work that we put in seemed to have\nreached people at last.%K%P
'Alright! Bring on those auditions!\nNothing can stop me now!'%K%P
'That's the spirit!'%K%P
I raised my hands\nas I cheered her on.%K%P
'Look at you, you're all excited too!'%K%P
'Of course.\nExcitement is the key ingredient for this stuff.'%K%P
'Hahaha, I guess you're right!'%K%P
The two of us finally had a\ngood laugh with each other.%K%P
We were both more than pumped.\nHeading out to Akiba was a good idea after all.%K%P
And absolutely what we needed.%K%P
'Okay, but...\nWhy this, then?'%K%P
'Tomorrow's the main audition, right?\nI can't handle the stress alone.'%K%P
On our way home from our date she suddenly asked me\nif she could spend the night.%K%P
I didn't have any real reason to say no,\nand was more than happy to have her, but...%K%P
'Okay, that's all fine and good,\nbut do you need to cling to me?'%K%P
'Hehehe, well...\nWe didn't get to do much today,\nso I figured I had to make up for it!'%K%P
She explained herself briefly\nas she came in for more kisses.%K%P
'Wait...\nYou do like doing this with me, right?'%K%P
'Of course I do.'%K%P
I responded in record time.%K%P
If we were really being honest,\nI'd have asked for more!%K%P
'Alright then. You asked for it.\nNow I'm gonna go all out!'%K%P
'Kyaah!'%K%P
